title: Jolly Roger's Lagoon
description: The underwater world of Isle o' Hags.

general.name: Octopus Swim Tutorial
general.description: With precise swimming movement, Banjo can avoid being hit by the octopus tentacles without freezing it.

general.name: Alcove Jinjo Slope Abuse
general.description: The slope timer can be abused to quickly climb to the alcove on the far side of the lagoon and collect the jinjo.

general.name: Pawno Skew
general.description: By setting Banjo to the proper angle and firing a clockwork shot, the clockwork can be walked through a loading zone and exploded to give Banjo a skewed angle and hitbox to steal Pawno's Cheato page.

general.name: Chris P. Bacon With 6 Clockworks + 3 Damage
general.description: Optimal movement for completing Chris P. Bacon while collecting 6 clockwork eggs and taking 3 damage in the process.

cwkshots.name: Pipe Honeycomb Shot
cwkshots.description: How to collect the honeycomb piece on top of the pipe with a clockwork.

cwkshots.name: Smugglerâ€™s Cavern Shot
cwkshots.description: How to collect the jiggy in Smuggler's Cavern with a clockwork.
